statements: SELECT * FROM EconomicData;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM EconomicData ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM EconomicData WHERE policy_category = 'Monetary';
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value, data_source FROM EconomicData WHERE indicator_value > 100 ORDER BY indicator_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM EconomicData WHERE data_source LIKE '%WorldBank%';
SELECT * FROM EconomicData WHERE indicator_value > 100 ORDER BY indicator_name ASC
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM EconomicData WHERE data_source = 'Government' ORDER BY indicator_value DESC
SELECT economic_indicator_id, policy_category FROM EconomicData WHERE indicator_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY policy_category, economic_indicator_id
SELECT indicator_name, data_source FROM EconomicData WHERE policy_category = 'Social' ORDER BY data_source
SELECT * FROM EconomicData WHERE policy_category IN ('Economic', 'Environmental') ORDER BY indicator_value
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_description, policy_name, policy_date FROM government_policy_data;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 100 ORDER BY indicator_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(indicator_value) AS max_value FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, AVG(indicator_value) AS avg_value FROM economic_indicators GROUP BY indicator_name;
SELECT * FROM government_policy_data WHERE policy_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY policy_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) AS policy_count FROM government_policy_data GROUP BY policy_name HAVING policy_count > 1;
SELECT id, indicator_name, indicator_value, date_collected FROM EconomicIndicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value, date_collected, id FROM EconomicIndicators WHERE indicator_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM GovernmentPolicy ORDER BY date_published DESC;
SELECT policy_name, date_published FROM GovernmentPolicy WHERE policy_name LIKE '%economic%';
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM MLTradingModels WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY last_updated;
SELECT * FROM EconomicIndicators ORDER BY date_collected DESC, indicator_value ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM EconomicIndicators WHERE indicator_value > 100 ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM GovernmentPolicy WHERE policy_name LIKE '%economic%' AND date_published >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM MLTradingModels WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM GovernmentPolicy ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TradingPredictions;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM EconomicIndicators WHERE indicator_value > 100;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM GovernmentPolicyData ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT model_name FROM TradingModels WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT prediction_date, prediction_value FROM TradingPredictions WHERE prediction_value < 50 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EconomicIndicators ORDER BY indicator_name DESC;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM EconomicIndicators WHERE indicator_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM GovernmentPolicyData WHERE policy_description LIKE '%financial%' ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM TradingModels WHERE model_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM TradingPredictions WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM government_policies ORDER BY policy_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_impact FROM government_policies WHERE policy_impact = 'positive' OR policy_impact = 'neutral';
SELECT data_date, AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY data_date ORDER BY avg_data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators ORDER BY indicator_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 100 ORDER BY indicator_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM government_policies WHERE policy_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY policy_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_name, policy_impact FROM government_policies WHERE policy_impact = 'Positive' ORDER BY policy_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_value, data_source FROM historical_data WHERE data_date = '2022-05-01' ORDER BY data_value DESC LIMIT 5;
